\Aura\SqlConnection

Classes

AbstractConnection Abstract class for SQL drivers.
Mysql MySQL connection adapter.
Pgsql PostgreSQL connection adapter.
Sqlite SQLite connection adapter.
Sqlsrv Microsoft SQL Server connection adapter.
